note.p: Poulterer and poultry judge. Of 113 Mount Street, Mayfair, London. Married Susanna Giblett in 1832. From at least 1861 lived at Hartley Witney, Hampshire. Father of John Baily.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1476/399/13), 1861 (RG9/707/15/24)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 March 2017)
London, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1538–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 21 March 2017)
